Content:: Vadivel Puththirasigamoney (born 10 October 1951) is a Sri Lankan politician and a former member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka.[1] Educated at Holy Trinity College, Commercial College and Administrative Staff College in India . ILO/Un Staff College Torino, Italy (Followed Diploma in Strategic use of IT. Have special diploma in Industrial Law. Deputy Minister of Justice and Law Reforms 2007-2010  This article about a Sri Lankan politician is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
